item.title: Book appointments through Vaniday
item.description: Source: Vaniday. Vaniday has been launched in Singapore. Vaniday, a platform for beauty and wellness services, has expanded to Singapore, its first market in Southeast Asia. The company recently secured â‚¬15 million in initial funding to support its growth. Vaniday wants to change how people find, book, and experience beauty and wellness services. The app and website allow users to browse a wide selection of salons and book appointments directly from the salon’s schedule.
